proj.zoie.impl.indexing
类 ZoieSystem<R extends org.apache.lucene.index.IndexReader,D>

java.lang.Object
  proj.zoie.impl.indexing.AsyncDataConsumer<D>
      proj.zoie.impl.indexing.ZoieSystem<R,D>
所有已实现的接口：
DataConsumer<D>, IndexReaderFactory<ZoieIndexReader<R>>, Zoie<R,D>
直接已知子类：
SimpleZoieSystem
public class ZoieSystem<R extends org.apache.lucene.index.IndexReader,D>
extends AsyncDataConsumer<D>
implements Zoie<R,D>

Zoie system, main class.

构造方法详细信息

ZoieSystem

public ZoieSystem(File idxDir,
                  ZoieIndexableInterpreter<D> interpreter,
                  IndexReaderDecorator<R> indexReaderDecorator,
                  org.apache.lucene.analysis.Analyzer analyzer,
                  org.apache.lucene.search.Similarity similarity,
                  int batchSize,
                  long batchDelay,
                  boolean rtIndexing,
                  Comparator<String> versionComparator)
Creates a new ZoieSystem.

参数：
idxDir - index directory, mandatory.
interpreter - data interpreter, mandatory.
indexReaderDecorator - index reader decorator,optional. If not specified, DefaultIndexReaderDecorator is used.
analyzer - Default analyzer, optional. If not specified, org.apache.lucene.analysis.StandardAnalyzer is used.
similarity - Default similarity, optional. If not specified, DefaultSimilarity is used.
batchSize - Number of indexing events to hold before flushing to disk.
batchDelay - How long to wait before flushing to disk.
rtIndexing - Ensure real-time.

ZoieSystem

public ZoieSystem(DirectoryManager dirMgr,
                  ZoieIndexableInterpreter<D> interpreter,
                  IndexReaderDecorator<R> indexReaderDecorator,
                  ZoieConfig zoieConfig)
Creates a new ZoieSystem.

参数：
dirMgr - Directory manager, mandatory.
interpreter - data interpreter, mandatory.
indexReaderDecorator - index reader decorator,optional. If not specified, DefaultIndexReaderDecorator is used.
zoieConfig - configuration object

ZoieSystem

public ZoieSystem(File idxDir,
                  ZoieIndexableInterpreter<D> interpreter,
                  IndexReaderDecorator<R> indexReaderDecorator,
                  ZoieConfig zoieConfig)
Creates a new ZoieSystem.

参数：
idxDir - index directory, mandatory.
interpreter - data interpreter, mandatory.
indexReaderDecorator - index reader decorator,optional. If not specified, DefaultIndexReaderDecorator is used.
zoieConfig - configuration object

public ZoieSystem(DirectoryManager dirMgr,

                  long batchDelay,

                  Comparator<String> versionComparator)

interpreter - data interpreter, mandatory.

analyzer - Default analyzer, optional. If not specified, org.apache.lucene.analysis.StandardAnalyzer is used.
similarity - Default similarity, optional. If not specified, DefaultSimilarity is used.
batchSize - Number of indexing events to hold before flushing to disk.
batchDelay - How long to wait before flushing to disk.
rtIndexing - Ensure real-time.

ZoieSystem

public ZoieSystem(DirectoryManager dirMgr,
                  ZoieIndexableInterpreter<D> interpreter,
                  IndexReaderDecorator<R> indexReaderDecorator,
                  DocIDMapperFactory docidMapperFactory,
                  org.apache.lucene.analysis.Analyzer analyzer,
                  org.apache.lucene.search.Similarity similarity,
                  int batchSize,
                  long batchDelay,
                  boolean rtIndexing,
                  Comparator<String> versionComparator)
Creates a new ZoieSystem.

参数：
dirMgr - Directory manager, mandatory.
interpreter - data interpreter, mandatory.
indexReaderDecorator - index reader decorator,optional. If not specified, DefaultIndexReaderDecorator is used.
docIdMapperFactory - custom docid mapper factory
analyzer - Default analyzer, optional. If not specified, org.apache.lucene.analysis.StandardAnalyzer is used.
similarity - Default similarity, optional. If not specified, DefaultSimilarity is used.
batchSize - desired number of indexing events to hold in buffer before indexing. If we already have this many, we hold back the data provider.
batchDelay - How long to wait before flushing to disk.
rtIndexing - Ensure real-time.

public ZoieSystem(File idxDir,
                  ZoieIndexableInterpreter<D> interpreter,

idxDir - index directory, mandatory.
interpreter - data interpreter, mandatory.
indexReaderDecorator - index reader decorator,optional. If not specified, DefaultIndexReaderDecorator is used.
docIdMapperFactory - custom docid mapper factory
analyzer - Default analyzer, optional. If not specified, org.apache.lucene.analysis.StandardAnalyzer is used.
similarity - Default similarity, optional. If not specified, DefaultSimilarity is used.
batchSize - Number of indexing events to hold before flushing to disk.
batchDelay - How long to wait before flushing to disk.
rtIndexing - Ensure real-time.

docIdMapperFactory - custom docid mapper factory
analyzer - Default analyzer, optional. If not specified, org.apache.lucene.analysis.StandardAnalyzer is used.
similarity - Default similarity, optional. If not specified, DefaultSimilarity is used.
batchSize - desired number of indexing events to hold in buffer before indexing. If we already have this many, we hold back the data provider.
batchDelay - How long to wait before flushing to disk.
rtIndexing - Ensure real-time.
maxBatchSize - maximum batch size
ReaderCacheFactory -

getVersion

public String getVersion()
return the current disk version. This method should be implemented such that we can use this value to do data syncing. So it is in general the disk version.

指定者：
接口 DataConsumer<D> 中的 getVersion
覆盖：
类 AsyncDataConsumer<D> 中的 getVersion
返回：
the version number of events that it has received but not necessarily processed.
另请参见：
AsyncDataConsumer.getVersion()

getCurrentDiskVersion

public String getCurrentDiskVersion()
                             throws IOException
返回：
the String representation of version for JMX purpose
抛出：
IOException

start

public void start()
从类 AsyncDataConsumer 复制的描述
Start the background thread that batch-processes the incoming data events by sending them to the background DataConsumer.
If this method is not called, all threads trying to send in data events will eventually be blocked.

指定者：
接口 Zoie<R extends org.apache.lucene.index.IndexReader,D> 中的 start
覆盖：
类 AsyncDataConsumer<D> 中的 start

isReadltimeIndexing

getIndexReaders

public List<ZoieIndexReader<R>> getIndexReaders()
                                                                                     throws IOException
return a list of ZoieIndexReaders. These readers are reference counted and this method should be used in pair with returnIndexReaders(List> readers) returnIndexReaders(List). It is typical that we create a MultiReader from these readers. When creating MultiReader, it should be created with the closeSubReaders parameter set to false in order to do reference counting correctly.

指定者：
接口 IndexReaderFactory<ZoieIndexReader<R extends org.apache.lucene.index.IndexReader>> 中的 getIndexReaders
返回：
List of IndexReader instances
抛出：
IOException
另请参见：
IndexReaderFactory.getIndexReaders()

                        throws IOException

IOException

public int getRAMASegmentCount()

getRAMBSegmentCount

public int getRAMBSegmentCount()

returnIndexReaders

public void returnIndexReaders(List<ZoieIndexReader<R>> readers)
return the index readers. Since Zoie reuse the index readers, the reference counting is centralized. Same readers should not be returned more than once.

指定者：
接口 IndexReaderFactory<ZoieIndexReader<R extends org.apache.lucene.index.IndexReader>> 中的 returnIndexReaders
参数：
readers - The index readers to return. Should be the same as the one obtained from calling getIndexReaders()
另请参见：
IndexReaderFactory.returnIndexReaders(java.util.List)

syncWithVersion

public void syncWithVersion(long timeInMillis,
                            String version)
                     throws ZoieException
从类 AsyncDataConsumer 复制的描述
Waits until all the buffered data events up to specified version are processed.

指定者：
接口 Zoie<R extends org.apache.lucene.index.IndexReader,D> 中的 syncWithVersion
覆盖：
类 AsyncDataConsumer<D> 中的 syncWithVersion
参数：
timeInMillis - the max amount of time to wait in milliseconds.
version - the version of events which it waits for.
抛出：
ZoieException
